title: Whenever Riot releases an attractive champion

Because china or smthin, had to pander to the audience that likes crapped-out disposable mobile game quality games in more ways than 1
pffffft {{champion:19}}
Dude, wait. Akali wears loose breeches. I'll give you the rest but akali is imo one of the most sensible and well executed redesigns in league. Sells the back alley ninja aesthetic really well.

They are warriors.  Of course they are going to have big thighs.  A woman with small thighs isn't going to be running, jumping, rolling all over the place while fighting.  If a woman did have small thighs they wouldn't stay small for long in a battlefield environment.
90% of the females in this game have big tits. Do they have a tits fetish? Why aren't you guys complaining then?
We miss akali side boob :/
{{champion:164}}
I'm not sure it's entirely a fetish but rather an animation decision.
Norhing wrong about it.
sickening. cmon it's 21st century. get over this stereo type, Can we do better than this Riot?

I think a big difference here is that Qiyana is actually a plump girl, but her splash doesn't give us that. I'm more upset by that, because her model in game has curves and big hips, whereas the splash does not.
I thought even the teaser and the gameplay trailer gave that sense. It is a bit odd that you don't get that impression from her splash art, and I didn't think about it until you pointed it out.
give it a day or two, people according to internet are not allowed to be attractive.
You are massively misunderstanding those peoples arguments then.
When you see your meme in a meme! That's it! It's over! I won boards! I have officially peaked!

One attractive PEAR indeed.

My favorite part is when the champion is attractive so that completely invalidates all lore and their entire backstory is garbage. You make that champion mildly attractive like Taliyah and BOOM, golden lore. You could see it happen with Kai'sa. She had a decent lore but because she didn't look crazy and her VO had a calm voice, her lore is now completely trash. Despite her lore being really decent if you actually read it and explaining how she ended up how she did in a completely justifiable way, they just call it trash.

> [{quoted}](name=The Trent,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EAhB9p20,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-06-08T04:30:02.530+0000)
>
> My favorite part is when the champion is attractive so that completely invalidates all lore and their entire backstory is garbage. You make that champion mildly attractive like Taliyah and BOOM, golden lore. You could see it happen with Kai'sa. She had a decent lore but because she didn't look crazy and her VO had a calm voice, her lore is now completely trash. Despite her lore being really decent if you actually read it and explaining how she ended up how she did in a completely justifiable way, they just call it trash.

The problem with Kai'Sa was that she had a cleavage down till her belly button for no reason whatsoever and yes, her being just a "human in a suit" was both a missed opportunity and also kind of unrealistic given she had spent the better part of a decade hunting void creatures close to a giant void portal. She and her void symbiote should have become almost 1 entity by the time she got out. As for how she should have looked, take a look at Kerrigan. She's equal parts Zerg and human while still being recognizable as the attractive young woman she once was.  Really, the only reason I can come up with why Kai'Sa looks like she does is that some high-up marketing dude at Riot or Tencent said "sex sells so give her a massive cleavage for no good reason whatsoever".
This image basically encapsulates me every time. Thank you gracious OP.... just thank you....

I just... really don't like Qiyana.

* [Her proportions are a bit... off.](http://magaimg.net/img/85wl.png)
* Her hair looks like it's molded out of clay.
* Her body language/expression make me hate her.
I mostly see complaints about her hairstyle not being appropriate for where she is from, her having unrealistically thick thighs and her simply being bland overall. Not that she's too sexy.
